name: split_pastel
description: Split layout with pastel backgrounds. Rounded shapes and clean type.
signature_elements: Rounded pill shapes and soft corners
extra_css: .split-pastel { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; height: 100%; } .pastel-left { background: var(--bg-left); display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; padding: var(--slide-padding); } .pastel-right { background: var(--bg-right); display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; padding: var(--slide-padding); } .pill-button { display: inline-block; padding: 0.5em 1.5em; border-radius: 999px; background: var(--accent); color: white; font-weight: 600; }
